title: Reliving the Golden Globes and Reviewing '9-1-1' (Ep. 216)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald reflect on their favorite moments from the Golden Globes, including Seth Meyers's and Oprah’s performances (1:00). Later, Chris and Andy bring back “In or Out” for Fox’s new show, ‘9-1-1’ (31:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
